name: Music Word World
description:
Music Word World v1.0

Created for young and old students of music at home, music teachers in lessons, and anyone with an interest in immersing themselves in music. Part of the Intergalactic Music Adventure series by Azzurro.

Build on a new planet by answering randomised music vocabulary questions! (It's like an animated, supercharged multiple choice quiz you can do as homework or for fun)

Juice up your WordWorld meter 3 questions at a time and beam buildings down to the planet below; from a humble hut to an airport and an astronomy tower, attracting visitors as you go.

Get your daily practice to beat the game by progressing through the first 20 levels and building a flourishing new planet full of life!

v1.0 - currently a database of 134 words from classical music vocabulary that would be recognisable by anyone up to a grade 3ish AMEB standard.

**This game is also designed to be playable by somebody with absolutely no classical music knowledge, by ruling out wrong answers. It's not always that easy though, the A.I. one step ahead of you by being selective with the right AND wrong answers it comes up with!

_______________

COMING IN V2.0

An A.I. assitant that will reveal clues about the words in the style of the professor pal AI buddy in Infinite Note Guessing Game
Expanding on the database (currently classical focused) to include contemporary music terms (i.e. DJ, audio, AUX, music vid, stream).
